main.docTitle: Water Pollution Control (Southern Water Control Zone) (Appointed Days) (Consolidation) Order

section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: This Order may be cited as the Water Pollution Control (Southern Water Control Zone) (Appointed Days) (Consolidation) Order.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Application
section.content: This Order applies to the Southern Water Control Zone.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Interpretation
section.def: sewage (污水) means any waste of the kind which is ordinarily discharged from a toilet, watercloset, bath, shower, sink, basin or kitchen fitment, whether or not it receives any treatment prior to discharge.

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: under section 7(2) of the Ordinance is 1 August 1988 for the purposes specified in paragraph 5(a);

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: under section 7(3) of the Ordinance is 1 April 1989 for the purposes specified in paragraph 5(b);

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: under section 7(2) of the Ordinance is 1 August 1989 for the purposes specified in paragraph 5(c); and

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: under section 7(3) of the Ordinance is 1 April 1990 for the purposes specified in paragraph 5(d).

section.name: s5
section.heading: Specified category of discharge or deposit

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: in paragraph 4(a) applies to the discharge or deposit of sewage from all sources other than premises used exclusively for manufacturing or processing trades;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: in paragraph 4(b) applies to the existing discharge or deposit of sewage from all sources other than premises used exclusively for manufacturing or processing trades;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.leadIn: in paragraph 4(c) applies to the discharge and deposit of all discharges and deposits other than—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: those made in accordance with the Waste Disposal Ordinance (Cap. 354); and

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.leadIn: in paragraph 4(d) applies to all existing discharges and deposits other than existing discharges or deposits—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: made in accordance with the Waste Disposal Ordinance (Cap. 354); and
